REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0479 reute r f BC-LTV-<LTV>-WINS-18.5-M 03-11 0064

TEXT.TITLE: LTV <LTV> WINS 18.5 MLN DLR PAKISTAN ORDER
TEXT.BODY: LTV Corp said Pakistan ordered 180 military trucks and spare parts worth 18.5 mln dlrs from AM General, a unit of LTV's Missles and Electronics Group. The company said the order includes 140 M809 Series five-ton trucks and 40 M44A2 Series 2-1/2 ton trucks. They are scheduled to be delivered later this year. Reuter
